name: PVC Tape - Extra Strong
description: With the PVC tape in white, you not only bring stability but also style to your packaging. The bright white color is ideal for a clean, professional appearance - whether in office shipping, for presentation packaging, or with sensitive goods. The powerful natural rubber adhesive provides immediate adhesion and lasting security. Quietly unrolling and easy to handle - perfect for daily use.
